a.title: HTC providing free wi-fi at high schools

div.a: HTC providing free wi-fi at high schools

nav.div: Georgetown County School District » COVID-19 INFORMATION / UPDATES

p.span: Georgetown County School District – along with all other school districts in South Carolina – are closed through the end of April by order of Governor Henry McMaster. During this declared state of emergency, our district is working to assist our students and school families.
We are working through many issues and doing our best to keep our stakeholders informed. Together we will get through this challenging period.
